content.question: Based on the experimental results, which of the following explains the most likely defect in muscle cells of patients with type 2 diabetes?

choices.label: Insulin receptor proteins do not reach the cell surface.
Insulin does not activate its receptor.
IRS-1 activation is reduced at high insulin concentrations.
GLUT4 blocks glucose from entering cells.

content.answer: IRS-1 activation is reduced at high insulin concentrations.

skill.text: 2.B: Explain relationships between characteristics of biological models in both theoretical and applied contexts.
